subject: "Express Shipping"
description_text:
I placed an order a few weeks ago for your Pro X Ultra pedals, i chose
express shipping at the checkout because it said delivery would take 3-8
days, i am now on day 22 and still no sign of the pedals, you sent the
haptic motors 4 days ago (just left outside front door) but they are pretty
useless without the pedals. I've paid an extra Â£20 to get express shipping
and i dont know why because it is very poor and the tracking system is
awful and unclear, if my pedals dont arrive by sunday then i want a refund
and you can cancel the delivery i've had the week off work to wait for this
delivery and if they are not here by sunday there will be no-one here next
week to take the delivery.

conversations.body_text: Hi Jay Davidson,     We sincerely apologize for the delay. Due to the extended holiday period in China, the package experienced an unexpected delay in transit. It is now scheduled for delivery today. We will issue a refund for the additional shipping charges and provide a $10 shipping compensation. We deeply regret the inconvenience caused. https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045935922376,SF6045935922251
